meanings.sent1: She is a teetotaling person who never drinks alcohol.
meanings.sent2: The teetotaling group at the party only drank water and juice.
meanings.sent3: The teetotaling cat refused to lap up the spilled beer.
meanings.sent4: Her teetotaling lifestyle shone brightly among her friends who enjoyed cocktails.
meanings.sent5: The teetotaling decision to avoid alcohol saved her from a headache the next morning.

meanings.definition: The practice or habit of abstaining from alcoholic drinks.
meanings.sent1: His teetotaling was well-known among his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: Teetotaling is becoming more popular among young adults.
meanings.sent3: The teetotaling of the office party was a topic of discussion for weeks.
meanings.sent4: Her teetotaling was like a shield against the temptations of the bar.
meanings.sent5: The teetotaling of the marathon runners helped them stay hydrated and focused.
